recipesJson.name: Rin's Chocolate Coffee
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Light chocolate coffee (imagine chocolate milk with a hint of coffee) with hints of graham, vanilla and marshmallow. Good right away. Increase chocolate mouse if you want that note more pronounced. I personally do not like super heavy chocolate vapes.

reviews.text: It's what she said it is, “Light chocolate coffee (imagine chocolate milk with a hint of coffee) with hints of graham, vanilla, and marshmallow." I have to say I’m also getting a touch of caramel that isn’t in the description and should be for as prominent as it is, but I’m not really going to complain about that. Just a hint of coffee, and no yucky coffee off notes. A little light in flavor - I mix Rin’s recipes as written and despite the low-doses of ingredients I almost always find them plenty flavorful. But this one is a little light. Notes say she likes chocolate on the lighter side and suggests bumping that up if you want more, so that’s forgiven. Next time I’ll do that, hopefully it will still be balanced enough that it doesn’t drown out the graham, marshmallow, vanilla, and coffee because those are nice little accents. But if it does a little, I’m sure it will still taste good. VT Chocolate Mousse is a really nice flavor.
